content.en: Optimizing 3D Printing: Researchers are exploring ways to improve additive manufacturing, also known as 3D printing, by using algorithms to optimize the design process. These algorithms are being used to address various challenges, such as reducing the need for support structures, eliminating sacrificial support material, and integrating manufacturing constraints into the design. By leveraging the power of algorithms, scientists hope to make additive manufacturing more efficient, cost-effective, and capable of producing complex structures.
content.da: Optimering af 3D-print: Forskere undersøger måder at forbedre additiv fremstilling, også kendt som 3D-print, ved at bruge algoritmer til at optimere designprocessen. Disse algoritmer bruges til at tackle forskellige udfordringer, såsom at reducere behovet for støttestrukturer, eliminere ofringsmateriale og integrere produktionsbegrænsninger i designet. Ved at udnytte algoritmernes kraft håber forskerne at gøre additiv fremstilling mere effektiv, omkostningseffektiv og i stand til at producere komplekse strukturer.
